member.name: DISK_SPACE_INFORMATION
member.summary: The DISK_SPACE_INFORMATION structure contains information about the disk space for a particular volume.

member.name: DISK_SPACE_INFORMATION.ActualTotalAllocationUnits
member.summary: The ActualTotalAllocationUnits is the total volume size without considering Quota setting.

member.name: DISK_SPACE_INFORMATION.ActualAvailableAllocationUnits
member.summary: The ActualTotalAllocationUnits is the available space for the volume without considering Quota setting.

member.name: DISK_SPACE_INFORMATION.ActualPoolUnavailableAllocationUnits
member.summary: The ActualPoolUnavailableAllocationUnits is the unavailable space for the volume due to insufficient free pool space

member.name: DISK_SPACE_INFORMATION.CallerTotalAllocationUnits
member.summary: The CallerTotalAllocationUnits is the total volume size limited by Quota setting.

member.name: DISK_SPACE_INFORMATION.CallerAvailableAllocationUnits
member.summary: The CallerAvailableAllocationUnits is the available space for the volume limited by Quota setting.

member.name: DISK_SPACE_INFORMATION.CallerPoolUnavailableAllocationUnits
member.summary: The CallerAvailableAllocationUnits is the unavailable space for the volume due to insufficient free pool space.

member.name: DISK_SPACE_INFORMATION.UsedAllocationUnits
member.summary: The used space of the volume.

member.name: DISK_SPACE_INFORMATION.VolumeStorageReserveAllocationUnits
member.summary: A special type of reserved space for per-volume storage reserve. This is included in the TotalReservedAllocationUnits.

member.name: DISK_SPACE_INFORMATION.AvailableCommittedAllocationUnits
member.summary: The space that has been committed by storage pool but has not been allocated by file system.

member.name: DISK_SPACE_INFORMATION.PoolAvailableAllocationUnits
member.summary: Available space in corresponding storage pool. If the volume is not a spaces volume, the PoolAvailableAllocationUnits is set to 0.

member.name: DISK_SPACE_INFORMATION.SectorsPerAllocationUnit
member.summary: The number of sectors per allocation unit for the volume.

member.name: DISK_SPACE_INFORMATION.BytesPerSector
member.summary: The number of bytes per sector for the volume.
